QuestData.Title: The Book of Runes
QuestData.Description: The vast rocky area to the southeast, Giants' Run, has been overrun by Iron Dwarves. Scouts have reported seeing the dwarves coaxing stone giants from the ground, then carving runes on them.$B$BI can't fathom their motives, but I suspect they're somehow trying to turn the giants into weapons. The iron rune stonecallers and binders carry large tomes with them, which must contain the runes they're carving on the giants.$B$BCapture the pieces of this book, assemble them, and bring it back to me, $n.
QuestData.LogDescription: Prospector Belvar at Fort Wildervar wants you to bring him The Book of Runes.
QuestData.RewardText: <Prospector Belvar browses the book of runes.>$B$BHmm... there's so much here. I'm going to need some time to study it, and if we hope to understand these runes, we'll need to try to make our own.
